record.description: Cornerstone laying of the men's group of new residence halls south of the Midway at 61st Street and Ellis Avenue. Front row, left to right: Professor C. S. Boucher, Dean of the College Division; John Moulds, Secretary of the Board of Trustees; Charles F. Axelson, Board of Trustees member; President Robert Maynard Hutchins. Second row: Professor Allan Works, Dean of Students and University Examiner; Professor William E. Scott; Haydon Wingate and James Sheilber, student marshals. Back row: Walter G. Preston, Jr., Assistant to the President; Aaron J. Brumbaugh, Associate Dean.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Stamp: Please return to University of Chicago Public Relations Office.
